original_text: People who already knew Saul could not understand what was happening. When they saw him prophesying along with the prophets, they asked each other, ‘What has happened to this son of Kish? Has Saul himself become a prophet?’
korean_text: 전에 사울을 알던 모든 사람들이 사울이 선지자들과 함께 예언함을 보고 서로 이르되 기스의 아들에게 무슨 일이 일어났느냐 사울도 선지자들 중에 있느냐 하고

sentences.original_text: could not understand what was happening
sentences.korean_translation: 무슨 일이 일어나고 있는지 이해할 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: When they saw him prophesying along with the prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그가 선지자들과 함께 예언하는 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: 'What has happened to this son of Kish?'
Has Saul himself become a prophet?'
